<a name="dataprep"></a>

## Data Preparation

<a name="dataload"></a>

### Load Data
```{r,warning = FALSE}
steamdata <- read_csv("steamGameData.csv")
```

<a name="dataprepro"></a>

### Data Preprocessing
```{r}
#Rename id column(it was missing one, and received default name)
colnames(steamdata)[which(colnames(steamdata) == "X1")] <- "id"

#Drop columns that will definitely not be useful or that are redundant 
steamdata <- subset(steamdata, select = -c(link, store_genres, store_asset_mod_time, players_right_now))

#Extract game engine from detected_technologies
steamdata$engine <- gsub("^Engine\\.([^;]+).*", "\\1", steamdata$detected_technologies)

#now removes detected technologies
steamdata <- subset(steamdata, select = -c(detected_technologies))

#Show head of data
head(steamdata)%>%kable()
```
